name: Avartana
description: Avartana exemplifies an exclusive blend of traditional and progressive renditions of Southern Indian cuisine, which is rooted to the gravitas of the unique tastes, aromas and flavours of southern Indian spices. The Southern Indian Peninsula is unified by the region’s bounty of pepper and spices. Our offerings forge this unity and encompass a range of specially crafted tasting menus for discerning diners, who may choose to enjoy the pleasures of savouring an array of delicacies crafted by our chefs. Pronounced ‘avartan’, the word Avartana means rhythm, iteration, mysticism and magic. As the restaurant seeks to represent a new interpretation of South Indian cuisine in contemporary renditions, the name Avartana encapsulates the intention of offering different iterations that revolve around this unique cuisine. Presenting Southern Indian cuisine- reinvented and redefined

address_obj.street1: ITC Grand Chola, 63, Anna Salai, Guindy

address: ITC Grand Chola, 63, Anna Salai, Guindy, Chennai (Madras) 600032 India

name: The Cheroot Malt & Cigar Lounge
description: The ideal lounge for a quiet sit back with an aromatic cigar, fine malts and engaging conversation. With an enviable collection showcasing the finest brands of cigars from across the world, the Cheroot’s remarkable choice of fine malts and beverages bring many moments of nostalgia to knowledgeable connoisseurs.

name: Peshawri

photo.caption: Cuisine from the North West Frontier

description: Peshawri, one of ITC Hotels' signature culinary brands serves authentic cuisine from India's North West Frontier with it's community style dining and the concept of eating with your fingers. Showcasing the art of the tandoor with an assortment of flat breads combined with slow-cooked lentils, vegetables and meats exalted by freshly ground condiments, these signature dishes prepared in the restaurant's display kitchen are renowned for its robust flavours brought alive in simple elegance.

name: Madras Pavilion
description: A fine dining buffet and live station restaurant that serves the finest of Indian and international cuisines and is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner.

name: Royal Vega
description: An exclusive luxury vegetarian restaurant that features a fine collection of signature vegetarian dishes from the erstwhile royal kitchens of India.

name: Pan Asian
description: A Far-East Asian cuisine restaurant, featuring an award winning repertoire of culinary delights from Japan, China, Thailand, Vietnam, Malaysia and Indonesia.

name: Cafe Mercara Express
description: Café Mercara Express, the signature coffee house of ITC Grand Chola, brims with tantalising fragrances and serves a touch of peppy youthfulness with an enthralling freshness. Comprising of an exclusive coffee and milk bar, Café Mercara Express is a specialty coffee house that offers a break from the routine. It offers all day dining with a multicuisine a la carte menu and a wholesome selection of hot and cold beverages.

name: Ottimo Cucina Italiana
description: Ottimo Cucina Italiana is an endeavour to entice the palate with delectable and authentic flavours from Italy. This exquisite Italian Ristorante features a magnificently large live kitchen which puts our Chefs skills on display where additionally you can treat yourself by watching your feast being prepared in front of you. Take your pick from wood fired pizzas, elaborate antipasti and a variety of artisanal pastas and cheeses, not to mention grappa at the exclusive grappa bar and select wines from the wine anoteca.
address: No 63 Mount Road Guindy, 1st Floor, Chennai (Madras) 600032 India

name: Vasco's

photo.caption: Vasco's - All day dining Multi-Cuisine restaurant

description: Enjoy fresh and innovative global cuisine from live kitchens at the stylish, all-day dining restaurant, Vasco's at Hilton Chennai. The restaurant's modern furnishings and relaxed ambience, together with superb views of the city, ensure the perfect dining experience. An elevated private dining room with a bird's eye view of the restaurant below is available for those seeking an exclusive setting. Enjoy a lavish family brunch on weekends.
address: 124/1, J.N Salai, Guindy Hilton Chennai, Chennai (Madras) 600032 India

name: Tranquebar
description: ITC Grand Chola’s oasis of tranquility – an elegant bar where luxury and refinement make for a winning combination.
address: No 63 Mount Road ITC Grand Chola, Chennai (Madras) 600032 India
